summary: Automated Cross-chain yield aggregation - 0xNodes was founded to allow anyone to easily generate high APY returns, across any chain (even one they do not own any assets on), with minimal to no gas fees. You choose how involved you want to be in your investments. Actively manage your funds, making use of our seamless, cross-chain bridging to maximise your options, or set and forget by choosing a strategy curated by our team and we take care of the rest. We hunt down the high APYs, you harvest the yield.
